Statement-II : Speed of light is the ultimate speed of particle.

options.description: Both Statement I and Statement II are incorrect.
Both Statement I and Statement II are correct.
Statement I is correct but Statement II is incorrect.

questions.description: If E and p are the respective energy and momentum of a photon, then on reducing the wavelength of the photon:

options.description: both p and E will decrease
both p and E will increase
p will increase but E will decrease
p will decrease but E will increase

questions.description: The maximum kinetic energy of photoelectrons emitted form a surface when photons of energy 6eV fall on it is 4eV. The stopping potential in volt is

Both Assertion & Reason are True but Reason is not a correct explanation of the Assertion.
Assertion is True but the Reason is False.
